website_summaries.verdict: A stick vac with tools for even more convenience.
pros: Stands out for the removable handheld vacuum and variety of tools to help you reach crevices
A bigger dirt cup for fewer trips to the trash
At 7.3 pounds, it is lightweight and easily mounts to the wall with the included hardware
cons: Dirt canister can be difficult to fully empty

customer_reviews.title: Faulty?
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to LOVE this vacuum! Either it’s terrible or mine arrived faulty, I’m not sure but it got clogged and totally blocked within 5 minutes of using the first time. I only vacuumed a small area of hard pod floor and 1 wool rug. The fault light came straight on and we can’t find any info online or in the instructions so we are sending back. I’m disappointed as i researched for so long and this was what I decided on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery worked out of box but will not charge
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these a few months ago and it has been working great for us as my wife has a bad back. My daughter also has a bad back so we decided to buy one for her for her birthday. Got this and it worked to do initial clean then plugged in charger and battery. Battery wont charge, but came to us somewhat charged. Appears that vac works but battery and/or charger don't work. I am waiting to get my upgraded battery that I ordered and see what is going on. Kind of feel bad because I ordered upgraded battery for a machine that isn't working.
customer_reviews.author: edmocon

customer_reviews.title: It “sucks” and not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: It’s painful to think that I spent $200 on something so flawed and that I am unable to return! Use it for 3 minutes, it clogs where the intake meets the filter and then suction is gone until you wedge your hand in to pull out the clog. If I wanted to vacuum my floors by hand, I’d use a broom and a dust pan. When you clean the clog out and the dust/dirt falls all over the floor, you can’t even use this vacuum to clean it up! Someone please telll me who to contact about this. What a ripoff!!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well. Fuzz from area rugs jammed up all the way down tubing. Had to take apart to unplug . Dirt container never filled up just stayed in tubing. Would return if hadn't recycled all the packing material. Worst purchase I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a couple months
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a couple months. Then it started breaking. The Handle up top broke away from the shaft going to the bottom. Its only held on by 2 cheap screws. I fixed it better than it was manufactured and then other things started breaking. The wheels are so cheaply made that they start wobbling and sticking making it hard to use. The suction dies off over time and whatever dust is vacuumed up is caught in the tube so you always have to disassemble to get the clog out. And the final straw before I threw it away was the bristles/roller froze up and would not turn. This thing is very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murry

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it delivers. Having a cordless ...
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what it delivers. Having a cordless vac is convenient, for sure, but this one kept throwing warning lights every time I went onto carpet. Why have the battery be replaceable if the replacement cost half as much as the vaccum?
customer_reviews.author: OrganFreeman

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile! Without spinning brush that thing is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Suction is just not there. Without spinning brush that thing is useless. Update: 491 days into it entire thing came apart. Downgrading to 1 star. Plastic clips are so fragile and I can think of two times in that time when vacuum was actually used. Rest was pick up few bits here and there (mainly because it sucks at sucking). It is not worth 100$ hoover is asking right now.
customer_reviews.author: M. K.

customer_reviews.title: This product is a failure
customer_reviews.text: This piece of garbage sucks as hard as a 90 year old nun. Outside of it not doing it’s only function, my favorite feature is being shocked by the battery by simply turning the thing on and off. It clogs constantly, needs to be completely disassembled to free the bogged up dust and debris, and is an overall failure. Buy something else. Literally anything else. I got suckered in by the sleek design and cordless vacuum concept and am now better off cleaning my rugs and carpet with a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: This cordless vacuum is what I was looking for to compensate what my ECOVACS robot is not able to pick up, and for a quick cleaning. Do not expect impressive suction capabilities, it is not a Dyson, but it is enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Power head stopped working within two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Light weight battery life was good, the power head stopped working within two weeks. Assuring insurance wouldn't let me return it
customer_reviews.author: pamela d gouyer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for the best. Hopefully a new heavy duty cordless comes out ...
customer_reviews.text: Moves freely, But can’t work on a shag carpet and kept shutting off with the error light coming on.... I was hoping for the best. Hopefully a new heavy duty cordless comes out with appropriate pricing
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky at the top. The mode to switch from bare floors to carpet was not working and this was a brand new vacuum. The plastic parts look and feel cheap. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Rihana

customer_reviews.title: I almost look forward to vacuuming now. It's light ...
customer_reviews.text: I almost look forward to vacuuming now. It's light weight and the rechargeable battery lasts around 40 minutes when vacuuming hard surface floors. When using it to vacuum carpet the battery on your lasts around 20 minutes. I know that the various Dyson models are top rated. I've never used one before but, the Hoover Fusion suits my needs of picking up cat litter and hair from furniture perfectly. I just wish it would stand up by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Gabesl

customer_reviews.title: It does not have enough sucking power.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible sucking power. Didn’t return in time and now stuck w it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucked, or didn't I guess I would have to say. Gave it away and bought a Dyson
customer_reviews.author: Bert DeGroot

customer_reviews.title: The bendable tube between the actual floor piece that picks up easily clogs. Not good if someone has pets because ...
customer_reviews.text: dirt container too small. The bendable tube between the actual floor piece that picks up and the long tube easily clogs. Not good if someone has pets because of the frequent clogging.Latches to take apart the vacuum are difficult to make work Mine takes 2 hands and a foot to take off the canister or the bottom part. It does charge quickly and has decent suction. I love being cordless but moved on to a cordless Shark and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: LcR

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too much noise and hard to clean the garbage container. I’m so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Our little handheld Shark does much better. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to what we expected. Our little handheld Shark does much better. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Used it fairly frequently for around a year before the charger started giving me a flashing red triangle and wasn't charging the battery. $130 for a replacement charger and $60 for a replacement battery. Went out and grabbed a Dyson for what it might cost to get it going again. Up until it died, it was pretty decent. It might be inherent with these kinds of vacuums, but it clogged up A LOT on us. Pretty much anywhere something could take a turn, it would need unclogged every few uses. Extra filters are very handy, too. They take a long time to dry after washing and it will be worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cook

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for small rooms
customer_reviews.text: The BH53110 is best used for a quick vacuuming of a small room, e.g., bedroom. Very easy to maneuver. Also easy to empty the dust container. Needed a little assembly, but clear, easy to follow instructions. My one complaint is that it doesn't stand upright by itself. You have to lean it against a dresser, etc or, like my son did, park it in a shopping cart. For a small room that needs a once a week cleaning, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M. Hornstein

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have pets, don't even bother with this vacuum. We have a golden retriever, and the vacuum gets clogged every. time. we use it. It makes this awful screeching sound when it's clogged. It's also really hard to unclog it, we basically have to use a chopstick to push the clog out of the filter. Which is a super fun activity every time you want to vacuum! I'll also say that this is really just with vacuuming our small living room - it doesn't take much to clog it. Even if we didn't have the pet hair issue, I still don't think I would like it. It just doesn't have much power. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lockerman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. But, a little troublesome and awkward to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constantly jams with dust - don't wast your money!
customer_reviews.text: Sure. It picks up lots of dust. The problem is, the design of the filter and basket - it jams constantly. I cannot get through one or two rooms before it jams. They did not design it correctly. Wish I could return it! I WANT MY MONEY BACK
customer_reviews.author: CDMSALES12539

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first! Our first one we bought was defective and a maintenance light came on. I called them and i was told it could not be fixed. I had to use my own money and mail it to them. Once they received it they mailed me another one. I was without a sweeper for over a month. The replacement is refurbished and the attachments aren't even the same color! Guess what? After 10 minutes of use the same maintenance light is on again! Not very happy with this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Phillips

customer_reviews.title: broke right after opening
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good product for quick pickup. Head disconnected from the base and wiring is faulty. haven't had it for more than 6 months. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Mom from MI

customer_reviews.title: Not a good design
customer_reviews.text: Filter fills up really fast, after 5 minutes of vacuuming you have to stop to clean out filter. Good suction but internal filter clogs after every use within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: She is happy, that's all that matters
customer_reviews.text: Got it for the mother-in-law. She is happy, that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: J U

customer_reviews.title: Hoover could have done better
customer_reviews.text: Mode button is difficult to press between hardwood and carpet. Difficult to get apart to clean which has to be done quite often. Battery charger cannot be mounted to wall. It takes two hands to remove battery from charger. I'm very disappointed in this vacuum cleaner. I have had other Hoover vacuum cleaners before and have been quite satisfied but not for this model. Poorly engineered. After having this vacuum for a couple of months, my opinion is "It's still a piece of crap". Last Hoover Vacuum cleaner for me ever. I will buy a broom before I purchase anything from Hoover again
customer_reviews.author: ml_bright

customer_reviews.title: Don't even think about it
customer_reviews.text: I've had my vacuum over a year. I use it occasionally, it was okay, light weight, fair suction. Lately I've been using it more often. Today I'm throwing it away. I tried to vacuum with a recently charged battery, it died. I put in a freshly charged battery, it died right away! In order to find the model number you have to remove the battery, (with a thin flat blade the battery doesn't easily come out), put your camera in the slot where the battery goes, and take photo. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: corinne lashley

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: I hate this vacuum. The double tap trigger for continuous power doesn't work, making the vacuum useless. Maybe, I got a dud, but I don't want to spend two hours package up the piece of sh** and returning it. Where is the quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Silly Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not a vacuum I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my Hoover Fusion Max in December 2017. Now, after almost four months, it makes a high pitched sound and the problem indicator light is on. After trying every online problem shooting solution with no improvement, I contacted Hoover. They told me to take it to a service center for repairs. The closest authorized shop is 30 miles away from my home. I will have to take a couple of hours out of my time to take this $199 appliance 60 miles round trip to be repaired and then do the same thing to pick it up. What a huge ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: KDLW

customer_reviews.title: Clogs up constantly! Useless!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of read this review before I bought this huge pile of crap!!!! I didn't get it from Amazon, but had to write a review warning others DO NOT BUY!! You can't even use it for 2 minutes without it clogging. It is completely useless and a total waste of money!! Every time it clogs u have to take it apart and clean it. Almost 200 for a piece of crap I can't use. Unfortunately I've moved and can't find the receipt. I will never buy another Hoover product again!
customer_reviews.author: stjern99

customer_reviews.title: Clogs Constantly
customer_reviews.text: I have wood floors with several rugs. I can't vacuum a single rug without the thing becoming clogged and the warning light coming on. That requires me to stop and clean out the cup, which involves using a screwdriver or something similar that can reach into places my fingers won't fit. The vacuum was completely clogged with the warning light coming on before I could finish vacuuming one three by five rug and that happened repeatedly with every rug. This is probably the worst review I've ever written of a product, but this vacuum is really worthless. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: KCPD

customer_reviews.title: SECOND TO NONE
customer_reviews.text: Actually the best vacuum I've ever used. I live in a VERY tiny apartment in NYC and this is the perfect vacuum for such a small space. I easily store it in my storage closet since it's so small and it's SO easy to use. There are only three parts and it works perfectly for getting every nook, cranny, and small space in your house. I would imagine that this is perfect for large homes, too since there are about 5 different heads that you can easily change. I would recommend this to anyone in search of a great versatile vacuum for their apartment, home, business, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cox

customer_reviews.title: I can't drive easily. and It has poor performance to cleaning edge
customer_reviews.text: Well.. This is well made wireless vacuum cleaner you know. but few things make inconvenient. First, It's too heavy. When I saw package first time, there's a woman who swing this machine just one hand(even over head cleaning). I think, she must be a pro-athlete. Second, cleaner head is heavy and difficult to use. I can't drive easily. and It has poor performance to cleaning edge, under, crack, etc. Third, also It has poor performance to cleaning hard floor. This machine kick and stamp down chips or debris instead suction. But price forgive every faults. Spend you money wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Jang Sungwon

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Good
customer_reviews.text: This is mostly good. It is overall nice and light It picks up dirt easily on both carpet and hardwood. Battery charges quickly. lots of accessories are included. The reason for taking off one star is because it is somewhat top heavy which could make it difficult to use for long periods of time if being used as a handheld.
customer_reviews.author: Duffer.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just used my new cordless Hoover fusion vacuum to clean my whole house and my car. I love it!!! I was able to cover about 1300 sq ft area with a single charge. The vacuum went very easy between floor types. I like the easy of movement the vacuum gives in and between large and small areas. Also being able to vacuum under items instead of moving them is really nice. It was able to pick up a large pile of sand and dirt from my garage which surprise me. Only suggestion is I wish the package came with a bag for the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Daron Henson

customer_reviews.title: Good for small apartment
customer_reviews.text: Good if you plan ahead. This vacuum is very small and easy to use if you have a small house/apartment. But they container that holds everything that is sucked up is very small and needs to be emptied often. Also you need to plan ahead when you want to vacuum because you have to charge it. Once charged it is easy to move around and convenient to go from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: marc damman

customer_reviews.title: The Grey Seal Falls Out Without Help
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum until the little grey seal falls off. I say until because Hoover can't keep the part in stock and I have personally witnessed how hard it was to make sure the seal didn't fall in with the dirt. You have to call them directly during weekday business hours Eastern Time in order to even order the backordered part. Buyer Beware that you should order a replacement as soon as you buy this vacuum. I am waiting for my part arrive now.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 6 months or less
customer_reviews.text: We have had this vacuum for about six months. At first, it was great. Didn’t pick up everything, but did a good job overall. Now, though, it clogs with basically every use, regardless of emptying and thorough cleaning. Additionally, much of what we vacuum up falls right back out as soon as it’s turned off. Six months is nowhere near long enough a life for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S. Wolski

customer_reviews.title: I liked the convenience of not having a power cord
customer_reviews.text: I liked the convenience of not having a power cord. I wish it had a light on the vacuum. Also wish it had come with 2 batteries--one to use and one to have ready when the first battery needs charging.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: The hoover FUSION is very easy to use and is also very convenient
customer_reviews.text: The hoover FUSION is very easy to use and is also very convenient. I use it daily to clean up dirt that has been tracked in or spills around the apartment. The battery has a good life and I can clean my whole apartment twice without having to recharge it. I definitely would recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this vac...and I love it! With two young kids with lots of crumbs and mess, it picks right up! Super powerful, easy to use, my daughter loves it. Finally found a vac to keep up with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: Beyond easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ultra convenient, plenty of battery life to vacuum my entire apartment. Intuitive to use, and a great easy to read dashboard. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: used a few time just kept getting clogged around motor ...
customer_reviews.text: used a few time just kept getting clogged around motor area, messy to clean out and just frustrating, going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised that a brand name like Hoover would allow this poorly designed vac to be sold. The thing works great for about 5 minutes, then because of the poorly designed input to the holding canister clogs with hair or fuzz it becomes useless. The rechargeable battery is really nice, allowing another battery to be charged while using should you buy an extra. I use a thin dowel to constantly clean the clogged area, thankfully I live in a very small home with only a couple carpets. It has trouble with cat litter, and I don't mean a pile of it, I mean the sprinkling that occurs when the cat jumps out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto O. Nacinovich

customer_reviews.title: My favorite vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vacuum. It is so maneuverable, and easy to use. I dropped a star because it does clog relatively easily and is a PAIN to unclog, since you can’t get into where it clogs. But I used a little wire snake tool and the clog came out. It was from pet bedding, so we no longer will be using this vacuum for that. However, it’s absolutely perfect for the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: the first couple of time I used it was great, but then the
customer_reviews.text: I bought in 5/2018, the first couple of time I used it was great, but then the ! light comes on after a short amount of usage. Also it clogs at the neck where it meets the canister. You have to unclog it every few minutes of use. They need a better design where it empties into the canister. Also, the ! is come on even after I clean out the canister thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks and not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: The filter gets immediately clogged and the attachments are almost impossible to remove and exchange. I had a cordless Hoover upright model that was awesome. Unfortunately, they quit making it. This is not worth the money at any costs.
customer_reviews.author: DallasGirl

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS VACUUM FROM THE HOME DEPOT. IT IS THE WORST VACUUM I'VE EVER USED AND TRUST ME I'VE USED A $20 ONE FROM WALMART THAT WAS BETTER THAN THIS ONE. CANT BELIEVE I SPENT $170 + TAX ON THIS PIECE OF JUNK. SAVE YOUR TIME AND YOUR MONEY AND DON'T BUY IT. THERE IS LITTLE TO NO SUCTION. AND THE DUST DOESN'T EVEN SPIN AROUND WHICH MEANS AIR ISN'T GETTING INTO THE CANISTER.
customer_reviews.author: ashley c.

customer_reviews.title: There are better vacuums out there
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vacuum for about 3 months now and have noticed its ability to vacuum has dimished a great deal. Battery is fully charged but the vacuum doesn't really work as strongly as it did when we first got it. The filter is clean but yet it feels like its lost suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is the best little vacuum I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little vacuum I have ever used. It does my entire 3000sf on one charge and I can use the handheld to do my cars before I have to charge it ! I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Levine

product_meta.title: Hoover FUSION Max Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, BH53110
product_meta.description: Style Name:FUSION Max CordlessHoover fusion max cordless vacuum BH53110PC combines the power and suction you trust from Hoover, with cordless convenience. The Hoover Dashboard allows you to effortlessly select your desired cleaning mode, to ensure you receive the right clean on every floor type. While, the one pwr lithium battery with rapid charge delivers 2x longer run time and fade free power for a versatile whole home clean. Our wind tunnel technology, paired with a lightweight design helps you tackle deep down embedded dirt and dust, not only on the floor but also up high. For over 100 years, Hoover has reimagined the way we clean, delivering a complete collection of trusted, innovative and effective solutions designed to make cleaning easier for active families so they can get back to what matters most.
feature_bullets: Powerful cleaning Cordless versatility - combines the power and suction you trust from Hoover, with the benefit of cordless convenience
Whole home cleaning - gives you the ability to clean throughout your whole home with superior run time, rapid charge time and fade Free power
Lithium Ion Battery technology provides 3X longer run time, Rapid Charge and fade-free power
Wind Tunnel technology helps you capture dirt, dust and pet hair
Features advanced swivel steering to effortlessly maneuver around and under furniture, as well as in tight spaces

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars99 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Vacuum^Crevice Tool^Dusting Brush^Upholstery Tool^Wand Tool Storage Clip^Charger^Wall Mount
